description: Revokes an entitlement from a flow. Once an entitlement is revoked, the content becomes unavailable to the subscriber and the associated output is removed.

parameters.name: EntitlementArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the entitlement that you want to revoke.

parameters.name: FlowArn
parameters.description: The flow that you want to revoke an entitlement from.

nested_items.name: EntitlementArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the entitlement that was revoked.

nested_items.name: FlowArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the flow that the entitlement was revoked from.
